nodes.text: The Melusi Uprising was a conflict that took place at some point around 900 BBY. The Galactic Republic's Judicial Forces fought in an engagement of the surface of the planet Korvaii at the conclusion of the uprising.
The Melusi Uprising was created by Jason Fry and Paul R. Urquhart, and it received a brief mention in the 2012 guide book The Essential Guide to Warfare.
